name: Purin's Minesweeper
description:
Purin's Minesweeper is a classic Minesweeper game that has been themed after the amazing virtual YouTuber Inukai Purin!

Instead of bombs, you'll need to avoid cucumbers, which Purin dislikes with a passion. And instead of flags, you'll mark potential cucumber locations with paw prints.

With 3 difficulty levels and endless randomly generated levels, Purin's Minesweeper is sure to provide hours of fun for fans of Minesweeper and Inukai Purin alike.
Give it a try and see how many cucumbers you can avoid!

Disclaimer: OnlyFlans.dog is a fan project and is not affiliated with or endorsed by Inukai Purin or any associated parties. All images, characters, and references used on OnlyFlans.dog are the property of their respective owners and are used purely for artistic and entertainment purposes.

Flatpak and Ubuntu build Comming soon
